mapper.select: SELECT PA.ID AS id, PA.FDRID AS fdrid, PA.NAME as name, DOCID, CRTNDATE as crtndate, PA.LOC as loc, FILEID as fileId, FILESIZE as fileSize, PR.PAGEID as pageId, SA.COMMENTS as comments, SA.MIME_TYPE as mimeType, SA.VALIDITY_TYPE as validityType, VALIDITYDOC.name as nameValidityType, SA.DOCUMENT_TYPE as documentType, TYPEDOC.name as nameDocumentType, SA2.PAGEID AS pageSignedId, SAS.HASH AS hash, SAS.HASH_ALG AS hashAlg FROM A${idBook}PAGEH PA INNER JOIN IVOLFILEHDR IV ON FILEID = IV.ID AND IV.EXTID1 = ${idBook} AND IV.EXTID2= PA.FDRID AND IV.EXTID3= PA.DOCID INNER JOIN SCR_PAGEREPOSITORY PR ON IV.ID = PR.DOCUID AND PR.DELETEDATE IS NULL LEFT JOIN SCR_PAGEINFO PI ON PR.BOOKID = PI.BOOKID AND PR.FDRID = PI.REGID AND PR.PAGEID = PI.PAGEID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT SA ON SA.BOOKID = PR.BOOKID AND SA.FOLDERID = PR.FDRID AND SA.PAGEID = PR.PAGEID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT_SIGN_INFO SAS ON SAS.ID_ATTACHMENT = SA.ID LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT SA2 ON SA2.ID = SAS.ID_ATTACHMENT_SIGNED LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT_DOCUMENT_TYPE TYPEDOC ON TYPEDOC.ID = SA.DOCUMENT_TYPE LEFT JOIN SCR_ATTACHMENT_VALIDITY_TYPE VALIDITYDOC ON VALIDITYDOC.ID = SA.VALIDITY_TYPE WHERE PA.FDRID= #{fdrid}
